import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext.tsx'; import { Users, MapPin, Lightbulb, ArrowRight, CheckCircle, Globe, Heart, Zap } from 'lucide-react'; const Home: React.FC = () => { const { isAuthenticated } = useAuth(); const features = [ { icon: , title: 'Location-Based Problems', description: 'Post and discover problems in your local area with precise location mapping.' }, { icon: , title: 'Community Solutions', description: 'Get creative solutions from community members who understand your local context.' }, { icon: , title: 'Collaborative Platform', description: 'Work together with neighbors to solve common problems and improve your community.' }, { icon: , title: 'Verified Solutions', description: 'Upvote and verify solutions that actually work in real-world scenarios.' } ]; const stats = [ { label: 'Problems Solved', value: '1,200+' }, { label: 'Active Users', value: '5,000+' }, { label: 'Cities Covered', value: '150+' }, { label: 'Success Rate', value: '85%' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Solve Problems Together

Join CrowdSolve and connect with your community to identify, discuss, and solve local problems collaboratively.

{isAuthenticated ? ( Go to Dashboard ) : ( <> Get Started Sign In )}
{/* Stats Section */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.value}
{stat.label}
))}
{/* Features Section */}

How CrowdSolve Works

Our platform makes it easy to identify problems, propose solutions, and track progress in your community.

{features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature.icon}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* How It Works Section */}

Simple Steps to Make a Difference

1

Post a Problem

Share a problem you've noticed in your community with photos and location details.

2

Get Solutions

Community members propose creative solutions and share their expertise.

3

Take Action

Collaborate with others to implement the best solutions and track progress.

{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Make a Difference?

Join thousands of community members who are already solving problems and improving their neighborhoods.

{!isAuthenticated && ( Start Solving Problems Today )}
{/* Footer */}

Empowering communities to solve problems together.
